name: Celeb U Brawl
description:
Have you ever wanted to punch a politician, actor, or pop star? Congrats! We made Celeb-U-Brawl for you!



Practice your boxing skills in the Celeb U Brawl with the most famous people on our planet! You will never have a better opportunity to punch a celebrity in the face. Compete with other players, discover new locations and opponents, and upgrade your skill!



- Amazing caricatures of the most famous and powerful people in the world.

- The rich collection of characters. I mean most of them are pretty rich.

- Campaign mode that will take you from Hollywood to the White House.

- Opponents with unique behaviors and special moves that fit their personality.

- Whack a Celeb mode - whack some celebs instead of poor moles.

- Indiscriminate Slap mode - pick your favorite celebs and knock them out one by one!

- Fully customizable characters.

- Leaderboard where you can track your progress and compete with others



Any resemblance to persons, living or dead, is entirely coincidental or is intended purely as a parody or spoof of such persons and is not intended to communicate any true or factual information about that person.
